ygData.subject: "Twisting" - OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: MULTIPLE SHAMELESS PLUG ALERT! I have to have a chuckle..  I AM the proponent of the term riffing and speaking against using the term twisting The tenor
ygData.messageBody:
MULTIPLE SHAMELESS PLUG ALERT!

I have to have a chuckle.. I AM the proponent of the term "riffing" and speaking against using the term "twisting"

The tenor sax player (Kevin Kizer) from my (The Vanguard Aces http://www.vanguardaces.com)) also plays in another group (Ted Sirota's Rebel Souls) - they got "Critic's Choice" from the Chicago Reader reviewing their latest CD
http://www.cdnow.com/cgi-bin/mserver/SID=1220944738/pagename=/RP/CDN/FIND/album.html/ArtistID=SIROTA*TED/DDCN=MSI-M45445

The critic said that Kevin has a "tart twisty sound"... Made me think of this debate..

Slyde of Xegony
Aka "Fuzzbone" http://www.fuzzbone.com
